meanings.sent1: The small apple was weighable on the scale.
meanings.sent2: The weighable bag of flour was easy to lift.
meanings.sent3: The weighable puppy tried to jump on the scale.
meanings.sent4: Her weighable decision made a big impact on her future.
meanings.sent5: The weighable suitcase felt heavier than it looked.

meanings.definition: Able to be measured in weight.
meanings.sent1: The weighable fish was the biggest catch of the day.
meanings.sent2: The weighable package arrived at the doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The weighable clouds seemed to float in the sky.
meanings.sent4: His weighable effort in the gym paid off with stronger muscles.
meanings.sent5: The weighable snow on the tree branches sparkled in the sunlight.
